name: Miss Scarlet
description: A sophisticated, spellbinding sweetheart known for her ever-present scarlet earrings.

name: Colonel Mustard
description: A dignified, dapper and dangerous military man.

name: Mrs White
description: The frazzled yet fastidious and finical long-time servant of Tudor Manor.

name: Mr. Green
description: A plump, pompous looking businessman known for his money-oriented mobster ties.

name: Mrs Peacock
description: An elegant, enchanting aristocrat who bears a Queen-like resemblance with her tiara.

name: Professor Plum
description: A sharp-witted and supercilious scientist with the brains of Albert Einstein.
